title: Perform Metallurgical Bottle Roll Test
description: A lab technician performs a bottle roll test on a new ore sample to determine its leach characteristics and potential gold recovery.

tasks.description: Prepare the ore sample by crushing and grinding it to the target particle size.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sample is correctly prepared for the test.

tasks.description: Place the sample in a bottle with a cyanide solution and place it on rollers for a set amount of time (e.g., 24 hours).
tasks.expected_outcome: The leach test is set up and run according to standard procedure.

tasks.description: After the test, assay the remaining solids and the solution to calculate the final gold extraction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The test results are calculated, showing a 92% gold extraction for this ore type.
